```{r}
library(knitr)
library(dplyr)
library(maps)
library(sqldf)
```

#Get DATA
```{r}
raw_df <- read.csv('winemag-data-130k-v2.csv', stringsAsFactors=F)
raw_df %>% head() %>% kable()

#Select desired columns from the data frame
wine_data <- select(raw_df , 2,5,6,7,13,14)

#Analysis evalulate average mean points per country using summarise function. 
wine_data_variety <- wine_data %>%
  group_by(country ) %>%
  summarise(avg_points = mean(points)) 


wine_data_variety

wine_data_variety %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=country, y=avg_points)) + 
  geom_point() + geom_line() + 
  labs(title = "Average Points  per Country", x="Country", y="Points")


```
